TopicTitle: All stages firing at once on launch.

Articles.Content: I am having a issue were all my stages fire at once, and I don't know why. I have all them broke down into the correct stages but when I hit space to start the launch, they all fire. I have a 10 second video of it that I have put on youtube to show yall. It is doing it all to my builds. >And yes my game is a fresh clean install no mods<

Please read the sticky threads and provide the logs and such

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

KSP version: build id = 559 Branch: master, Windows 64x and on steam.

detailed explanation: When I built my rocket, I listed what I wanted to happen under stages and verified it on launch pad. But when I launch, all stages fire at once, even tho they are suppose to be separated and are listed as separated.

A screenshot - see linked video

craft file or save files / output_log.txt = http://www.gamefront.com/files/24457475/Alts+ship+save+and+log.rar

system specification:

Windows 7 64x

16gb 1600mhz ram

Nvidia 780ti gpu

Intel 4770k i7

Wow that's weird, and definitely shouldn't happen.

Does your spacebar do anything weird in other programs? Also, try remapping "Stage" to another key and see what happens.

HandleD3DDeviceLost

HandleD3DDeviceLost: still lost

Skipped frame because GfxDevice is in invalid state (device lost)

Oh this may be it, if you alt+tab while the game loads, you break KSP, please be patient or use windowed mode
I have been playing around with it. Space bar doesn't seem to be the problem, I changed the stuff around in the hanger and made the stuff launch under a custom profile instead of stages and it works.
Just to be thorough, can you see if the 32-bit version has the same issue?
Could it be that you've mapped things to the stage action group by accident?
